name: VLoopCheck
tagline: Lightweight Error Checkers for Vector Loops
body:
## Introduction
VLoopCheck perform compiler-level error detector synthesis to protect vector loops by mining the compiler-level invariants by analyzing the code-generation patterns. Our work is based on the publicly available, state-of-the-art [ISPC](https://ispc.github.io/) compiler. 

## Publication
Please refer to our [paper](http://www.cs.utah.edu/~vcsharma/pubs/dpdns2016-shrg.pdf) published at DPDNS'16 for further details. 

## Citation Information
```
@inproceedings{dpdns16vulfi,
  author = {Vishal Chandra Sharma, Ganesh Gopalakrishnan, Sriram Krishnamoorthy},
  title = {Towards Reseiliency Evaluation of Vector Programs},
  booktitle = {21st IEEE Workshop on Dependable Parallel, Distributed and Network-Centric Systems (DPDNS)},
  year = {2016},
}
```
